statements: UPDATE pharmacogenomics_data SET response_score = 5.5 WHERE patient_id = 1;
UPDATE pharmacogenomics_data SET genotype = 'AA' WHERE patient_id = 2;
UPDATE pharmacogenomics_data SET response_score = 7.8, genotype = 'GG' WHERE patient_id = 3;
UPDATE pharmacogenomics_data SET response_score = response_score * 1.2 WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin' AND genotype = 'AA';
UPDATE pharmacogenomics_data SET response_score = response_score * 0.8 WHERE drug_name = 'Paracetamol' AND gene_name = 'CYP2D6' AND genotype = 'CC';
UPDATE pharmacogenomics_data SET response_score = 100 - response_score WHERE patient_id = 1234;
UPDATE drug_gene_interactions SET interaction_score = 0.8 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE drug_information SET dosage = 10.5 WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE drug_gene_interactions SET interaction_score = 0.6 WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin';
UPDATE drug_gene_interactions SET interaction_score = 0.8 WHERE drug_name = 'Aspirin' AND gene_name = 'ABC'
UPDATE drug_information SET dosage = 500.0 WHERE drug_name = 'Paracetamol'
UPDATE drug_gene_interactions SET interaction_score = 0.5 WHERE drug_name = 'Ibuprofen' AND gene_name = 'XYZ'
UPDATE Drug SET drug_name='Updated Drug 1' WHERE drug_id=1;
UPDATE Gene SET gene_type='Updated Type 2' WHERE gene_id=2;
UPDATE DrugGeneInteraction SET interaction_strength=0.9 WHERE interaction_id=3;
UPDATE Drug SET gene_id = 12345 WHERE drug_id = 1;
UPDATE Gene SET gene_type = 'NewType' WHERE gene_id = 2;
UPDATE DrugGeneInteraction SET interaction_strength = 0.8 WHERE interaction_id = 3;
UPDATE gene_information SET gene_name = 'updated_name' WHERE gene_id = 1;
UPDATE drug_information SET drug_class = 'updated_class' WHERE drug_id = 2;
UPDATE interaction SET interaction_strength = 'strong' WHERE interaction_id = 3;
UPDATE gene_information SET gene_name='Updated Gene Name' WHERE gene_id=1;
UPDATE drug_information SET drug_class='New Drug Class' WHERE drug_id=3;
UPDATE interaction SET interaction_type='Strong Interaction' WHERE interaction_id=2;
UPDATE Drug SET drug_description = 'New description' WHERE drug_id = 1;
UPDATE Gene SET gene_description = 'Updated description' WHERE gene_id = 2;
UPDATE DrugPrescription SET dosage = 'Twice a day' WHERE prescription_id = 3;
UPDATE Drug SET drug_description = 'Updated description' WHERE drug_id = 1;
UPDATE Gene SET gene_name = 'New Gene Name', gene_description = 'Updated gene description' WHERE gene_id = 2;
UPDATE DrugPrescription SET dosage = 'Increase dosage to 20mg' WHERE prescription_id = 5;
